changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS notifications ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, header TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(256 > LENGTH(header)), body TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(2048 > LENGTH(body)), created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL, reservation_id BIGINT REFERENCES reservations(id), user_id BIGINT NOT NULL REFERENCES users(id), payment_id BIGINT REFERENCES payments(id) );
